00315   template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00316       bool operator()(const CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* lhs, const CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* rhs) const {
00317           Err::errAbort("CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00318           return false;
00319       }
00320   };
00321 };
00322 
00323 template<> struct CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::ComparePred<0> {
00324     bool operator()(const CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* lhs, const CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* rhs) const {
00325         return lhs->m_strProbeSetName.compareTo(rhs->m_strProbeSetName, 0) < 0;
00326     }
00327 };
00328 template<> struct CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber::ComparePred<1> {
00329     bool operator()(const CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* lhs, const CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* rhs) const {
00330         int iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(lhs->m_ucChromosome, rhs->m_ucChromosome);
00331         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00332             iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(lhs->m_uiPosition, rhs->m_uiPosition);
00333         }
00334         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00335             iCompareResult = lhs->m_strProbeSetName.compareTo(rhs->m_strProbeSetName, 0);
00336         }
00337         return iCompareResult < 0;
00338     }
00339 };
